org.silex.runtime.ressource.RessourceLoaderManager

type
class
Manages the queue of files to load, and exposes method to load ressources of diferrent types.

Static Methods

loadAnimation(url : String, successCallback : org.silex.runtime.domobject.js.AnimationDOMObject -> Void, errorCallback : String -> Void, ?allowCache : Bool) : Void

parameters
url the url of the file to load
successCallback the callback which must be called once the file is successfully done loading
errorCallback the callback which must be called if there was an error during loading
allowCache wheter to allow the browser to cache the loaded file
Create a RessourceData object and add to the list of files to load by calling addRessourceData

loadContainer(url : String, successCallback : org.silex.runtime.domobject.ContainerDOMObject -> Void, errorCallback : String -> Void, ?allowCache : Bool) : Void

parameters
url the url of the file to load
successCallback the callback which must be called once the file is successfully done loading
errorCallback the callback which must be called if there was an error during loading
allowCache wheter to allow the browser to cache the loaded file
Create a RessourceData object and add to the list of files to load by calling addRessourceData

parameters
